wikipedia_page.main: George Vale Owen (26 June 1869 – 9 March 1931) was a clergyman of the Church of England and one of the best-known spiritualists of the early twentieth century.

response: In 2019, a print of the first of the five photographs, sold for £1,050. A print of the second photograph was also put up for sale but failed to sell as it did not meet its £500 reserve price. The photographs previously belonged to the Reverend George Vale Owen.
* George Vale Owen, one of the best-known spiritualists of the early twentieth century
*George Vale Owen (1869–1931), Church of England clergyman and spiritualist
